video.title: My Boys
video.synopsis: Sportswriter P.J. Franklin has a tight group of poker-playing guy friends, but all those men hanging around tend to get in the way of romance.

episodes.synopsis: Chicago sportswriter P.J. Franklin, a woman working in a man's world, finds her attracted to a handsome new colleague in the press box.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: P.J. isn't sure what to think after Bobby comes home from a road game bearing gifts, then shows up at the tavern with a beautiful woman on his arm.
episodes.title: Mixed Signals

episodes.synopsis: As her efforts to play matchmaker for Stephanie cause a rift to open up between them, P.J. learns that everyone knows about her and Bobby.
episodes.title: Team Chemistry

episodes.synopsis: After concluding that they are all in a dating slump, P.J. persuades her friends to take her with them on their night of hunting for women.
episodes.title: The Slump

episodes.synopsis: As Brendan drops a bombshell about his on-again, off-again girlfriend, P.J.'s "grown-up" dates with Hank leave her friends without a ringleader.
episodes.title: The Show

episodes.synopsis: As she reluctantly agrees to get to know Brendan's fiancée, P.J. decides it's time for her new boyfriend, Hank, to spend some time with her pals, too.
episodes.title: Clubhouse Cancer

episodes.synopsis: P.J. lies to Hank in order to join her friends for the first night of their annual game decathlon.
episodes.title: Free Agent

episodes.synopsis: P.J. worries when Mike starts seeing a beautiful new woman who has a penchant for dating celebrities.
episodes.title: Superstar Treatment

episodes.synopsis: Though excited by the prospect of having her brother out from under his wife's thumb for a weekend, P.J. soon regrets the return of "Fun Andy."
episodes.title: Managers

episodes.synopsis: After accepting his invitation to Chicago's most exclusive club, P.J. discovers that Kenny's annoying friend, Trouty, may not be as bad as he seems.
episodes.title: Take One for the Team

episodes.synopsis: Everyone is stunned when P.J. and Andy's Aunt Phyllis ends up in bed with Kenny.
episodes.title: When Heroes Fall

episodes.synopsis: A mercy date with an old college classmate backfires for P.J.; Mike is doubly upset about being fired after he learns that Bobby knew about it first.
episodes.title: Released

episodes.synopsis: Plans for Andy's surprise birthday party shed new light on Meredith. Meanwhile, stories about college romance reveal the truth about Brendan and P.J.
episodes.title: Baseball Myths

episodes.synopsis: Brendan moves on to another girlfriend after his kiss with P.J.; Kenny dates a pregnant woman; Andy copes with the long commute from the suburbs.
episodes.title: Promise of a New Season

episodes.synopsis: P.J. is invited to appear on a cable television sports show; Andy solves his commuting nightmare by rooming with Mike.
episodes.title: Off Day

episodes.synopsis: Brandon is chosen as one of "Chicago's 50 Sexiest Bachelors," while P.J. contemplates an ethically questionable relationship with a new Cubs pitcher.
episodes.title: Ethics

episodes.synopsis: Everyone learns that Bobby comes from a wealthy family and that Stephanie is deeply in debt, and suspect that Kenny is imagining his new girlfriend.
episodes.title: Dirty Little Secrets

episodes.synopsis: P.J. senses romance when an old boyfriend returns to town; Mike convinces Kenny to give him a job; Stephanie gets some harsh financial news.
episodes.title: Second Chances

episodes.synopsis: P.J. finds she has little in common with an old college friend; Brendan has changed since being named one of the city's sexiest bachelors.
episodes.title: Douchebag in the City

episodes.synopsis: Brendan, Mike and Kenny compete for the attention of an attractive divorcée, as Andy starts to worry that he is becoming too much like his parents.
episodes.title: The Estates of Hoffman

episodes.synopsis: As P.J. makes the mistake of inviting her new boyfriend to poker night, Andy's mid-life crisis leads him to buy a boat without telling his wife.
episodes.title: 110% Solution

episodes.synopsis: Dateless three days before she is supposed to leave for Italy, P.J. suddenly is deluged with offers by a trio of handsome men willing to join her.
episodes.title: Rome If You Want To

episodes.synopsis: While P.J. is on what she hoped would be a romantic trip to Italy with Bobby, Mike's affair with a new waitress gets everyone banned from Crowley's.
episodes.title: The Transitioning

episodes.synopsis: P.J. decides to shake up her flagging love life with a singles dinner party at her apartment.
episodes.title: Dinner Party

episodes.synopsis: Brendan, Mike, Kenny and Bobby agree to a "Project Runway"-style shirt-making contest; P.J. is hired to co-write a book by a mercurial Mets pitcher.
episodes.title: The Shirt Contest

episodes.synopsis: P.J. worries about Bobby when he announces that he is getting married to keep his girlfriend, Elsa, from being deported.
episodes.title: Spit Take

episodes.synopsis: As Andy's close relationship with a co-worker arouses the suspicion of his friends, Brendan takes a mailroom job at the law firm.
episodes.title: Take My Work Wife

episodes.synopsis: P.J. is unhappy about not being invited to Bobby's bachelor party.
episodes.title: Dudes Being Dudes

episodes.synopsis: Jack's reputation as a ladies' man has P.J. rethinking the idea of dating him, while Andy reluctantly agrees to join Meredith in couples therapy.
episodes.title: Opportunity Knocks

episodes.synopsis: The trip to the Newman family ranch for the wedding runs aground thanks to years of family tension between Bobby, Jack and their father.
episodes.title: Jack and Bobby

episodes.synopsis: As P.J. tries to bring Jack back in time for the wedding, Bobby begins to have second thoughts about marrying Elsa.
episodes.title: John, Cougar, Newman Camp

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of Bobby's canceled wedding, P.J. and the gang regroup back in Chicago.
episodes.title: Welcome Back, Kalla Fötter

episodes.synopsis: Though P.J. and Bobby try to keep their romance under wraps, their friends get suspicious and investigate.
episodes.title: Private Eyes

episodes.synopsis: P.J.'s new promotion has Bobby worrying about how he should react.
episodes.title: The Boyfriend Hat

episodes.synopsis: The annual games decathlon weekend opens a rift between Bobby and P.J. when he accuses her of being too competitive.
episodes.title: Decathlon: Part Deux

episodes.synopsis: P.J. spends a week helping Brendan make better decisions; Andy plays in Kenny's band; Mike meets a new woman at Stephanie's relationship seminar.
episodes.title: Carpe Burritoem

episodes.synopsis: As winter turns to spring, the warm weather sparks romance for P.J., Bobby and their friends.
episodes.title: Madder of Degrees

episodes.synopsis: Bobby feels threatened when P.J. uses Facebook to get in touch with an ex-boyfriend from college.
episodes.title: Facebook the Past

episodes.synopsis: P.J. hits it off with one of Stephanie's girlfriends; Andy is unnerved to find that Kenny and Mike are pals with a guy who was his marriage counselor.
episodes.title: Friends of Friends

episodes.synopsis: P.J. faces new challenges on her first assignments to Cubs' spring training; A player's girlfriend uses Brendan to make her boyfriend jealous.
episodes.title: Spring Training

episodes.synopsis: The search for Andy's replacement at the poker table reveals the history of how P.J. and her pals first met.
episodes.title: Addition by Subtraction

episodes.synopsis: Stephanie lands a reservation at an exclusive new restaurant for her, P.J. and their boyfriends, leaving Mike and Brendan on their own.
episodes.title: Gourmets and Confused

episodes.synopsis: Mike hopes for a big birthday surprise from his friends; Stephanie weighs a film deal for her book; fraud wipes out Bobby's family fortune.
episodes.title: Mike-Fest

episodes.synopsis: As Kenny and Mike set out to accomplish a series of manly tasks, Bobby looks to prove his worth by fixing P.J.'s leaky kitchen sink.
episodes.title: Be a Man!

episodes.synopsis: As Kenny and Mike each worry about their store's future, an article in a men's magazine makes P.J. wonder if her sex life with Bobby is waning.
episodes.title: The NTO

episodes.synopsis: When Bobby decides to shake things up with a new career, P.J. worries about what it will mean for their relationship.
episodes.title: Hanger Management

episodes.synopsis: P.J. and Stephanie help Mike and Brendan find a new approach to meeting women; Kenny asks Bobby to be his workout buddy, then lives to regret it.
episodes.title: Puss 'N' Glutes

episodes.synopsis: The sudden popularity of Crowley's forces the gang to look for a new haunt; Mike realizes he'll have to show his new girlfriend where he really lives.
episodes.title: Extreme Mike-Over

episodes.synopsis: As Mike plans to throw a birthday party for his new girlfriend and Stephanie prepares to move to London, P.J. considers a promotion at the paper.
episodes.title: My Men
